Traditional Way

Manual, time-consuming process

1

Prescription Written

Provider writes prescription, but coverage and requirements are unknown.

No visibility into coverage
2

Manual Benefits Verification

Staff spends hours on hold with payers to verify insurance coverage and requirements.

Hours of phone calls
3

PA Forms Filled Manually

Staff manually completes prior authorization forms, often missing required information.

Errors cause rejections
4

Status Check Calls

Repeated calls to check PA status, leaving patients frustrated and uninformed.

Days of uncertainty
5

Delayed Fulfillment

Medication fulfillment delayed due to incomplete paperwork or insurance issues.

Weeks of patient wait

Key Capabilities

Everything you need to simplify patient access and reimbursement

Coverage Inquiry

Instantly check insurance coverage, formulary status, and prior authorization requirements.

PA Automation

Auto-fill PA forms, predict approval likelihood, and ensure complete, accurate submissions.

Affordability Programs

Guide patients through co-pay coupons, free trials, and financial assistance eligibility.

Status Tracking

Real-time updates on benefits verification, PA status, and medication delivery.

Issue Resolution

Handle denials, suggest appeals, and triage complex cases to specialists.

Fulfillment Coordination

Track specialty pharmacy orders and coordinate medication delivery.
